mapper.select: select rownum n, deal_num, board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick from (select deal_num, d.board_num, title, content, bdate,views, board_type_num, m.member_num, member_nick from board b, member m, deal d where b.member_num = m.member_num and d.board_num = b.board_num and board_type_num = 33 order by d.board_num) where n between #{start} and #{end} ORDER BY n desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(board_num,title,content,bdate,views,board_type_num,member_num) values((select nvl(max(board_num), 0)+1 from board), #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, 33, 1)
insert into deal(deal_num,deal_price,board_num) values((select nvl(max(deal_num), 0)+1 from deal),#{deal_price},(select nvl(max(board_num), 0) from board))
insert into picture(picture_file_num, picture_fname, board_num) values((select nvl(max(picture_file_num), 0)+1 from picture),#{picture_fname},(select nvl(max(board_num), 0) from board))
mapper.select: select * from deal d, board b, picture p, member m where d.board_num = b.board_num and p.board_num = b.board_num and m.member_num = b.member_num and b.board_num=${board_num}
mapper.update: update board set views = views+1 where board_num = #{board_num} and board_type_num = 33
update deal set deal_price = #{deal_price} where board_num = #{board_num}
update board set title=#{title},content=#{content} where board_num = #{board_num}
update picture set picture_fname = #{picture_fname} where board_num = #{board_num}
